definition[0]: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action
example[0]: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
example[1]: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
example[2]: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
definition[1]: used to emphasize that you are talking about one particular thing, organization etc
